profile.name: Leticia Vasconcellos
profile.summary: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with over 15 years of experience, focusing on .NET and JavaScript frameworks. My career has been dedicated to building both web and desktop applications, with a strong foundation in database management.| I value the principles of Agile and Scrum, which guide my approach to development – practical, efficient, and always evolving. Continual learning and adapting to new technologies are integral parts of my professional growth.| My objective is to develop solutions that are not only effective but also user-friendly. In collaboration with teams, I aim to contribute to projects that make a real difference.

details.studies: Business Communication • Applications and Systems Development • Design Thinking and Agile Methodologies
Coaching and Career Planning • Integrative Practice for Data Intelligence

skills.group: ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, .NET Core
SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

experience.description: Engaged in full-stack development, specializing in .NET and Angular, and employing TypeScript for enhanced Angular projects.| Acquired experience with advanced message queue technologies, such as RabbitMQ and MassTransit, for efficient data handling and service communication.| Utilized MediatR for improved communication patterns in REST API developments, contributing to more efficient and maintainable code.| Participated in DevOps activities, including CI/CD pipeline maintenance and vulnerability scanning, to uphold high standards of application security and reliability.| Managed Oracle databases, focusing on optimizing data structures and query performance, thereby improving system functionality and efficiency.| Introduced to Agile Scrum methodology, enhancing my project management skills and team collaboration.| Utilized TFS Dashboard and Jira for efficient project tracking and management, streamlining the workflow and task organization.| Maintained project documentation using Confluence, ensuring that project knowledge was well-organized and accessible to the team.

Developed multiple websites employing Razor, JavaScript, C#, MS SQL, and also worked with jQuery. These projects improved my front-end development capabilities and reinforced my back-end skills.| Maintained and upgraded ASP MVC applications, gaining deeper insights into modernizing and enhancing legacy systems.| Acquired practical experience with cloud technologies, IIS, and automation through Power Automate, adding to my versatility as a developer.

Enhanced desktop ERP and ASP MVC systems, focusing on improving user interface and functionality. This role advanced my system analysis and design capabilities.| Gained valuable experience in ETL processes with PostgreSQL and Azure databases, integrating Talend and Data Factory, which enhanced my data processing skills. | First introduction to working in a team environment and was introduced to the Kanban methodology, which greatly improved my project management and collaborative skills.

Led the development of 'Consulte', a desktop application for automated data capture and validation, refining my application development and problem-solving skills.| Played a key role in providing user support and training, enhancing my ability to communicate technical concepts effectively to non-technical users.| Developed and maintained various desktop applications using VB.NET, balancing user needs with technical requirements to deliver practical solutions.| Gained extensive experience in web technologies, including ASP and HTML, and database management with MS SQL and MySQL.| Involved in installation and setup activities for WinForms and ASP WebForms projects, ensuring smooth deployment and functionality.

Transitioned from an office assistant to a developer role, addressing the company's need for a customized system, marking my initial step into software development.| Learned to work with MS Office, mastering advanced features in Excel and Access, which played a crucial role in my early development tasks.| Gained skills in analyzing and validating data, understanding the importance of accuracy and integrity in software solutions.| Developed foundational skills in software development, including migrating the custom system from Access VBA to VB.NET and MS SQL, laying the groundwork for my future career in technology.

certification.course: .NET Microservices: CQRS & Event Sourcing with Kafka
certification.description: Focused on learning Kafka and Docker within a .NET framework, gaining insights into CQRS and Event Sourcing, and enhancing my understanding of microservices architecture.
Acquired foundational knowledge and practical skills in Scrum methodologies, which complemented my experience with agile practices in software development.
Deepened my expertise in ASP.NET MVC, focusing on advanced features and best practices to enhance web application development skills.
Gained comprehensive knowledge in unit testing for C#, emphasizing the importance of testing in ensuring code quality and application reliability.
Strengthened my SQL Server skills, focusing on fundamental concepts and practical applications in database management.
Entered the realm of programming with VB.NET, building a foundational understanding of programming concepts and application development.
